entries.title: Judge said to reject FTC effort to block Meta’s VR acquisition
entries.description: The case was widely viewed as a test of a new competition movement — sometimes derisively called “hipster antitrust” — that argues that antitrust laws apply to future competition, not just the current market.

entries.title: Looking beyond phones, Samsung plans to make ‘extended reality’ devices
entries.description: Meta has leaned heavily into wearable "extended reality" headsets. Apple is expected to do the same. Now, Samsung may be entering the mix — and it has help.

entries.title: This software tries to spot lung cancer years earlier. Can it?
entries.description: The advance could pave the way for doctors to spot tumors that are notoriously hard to detect early.
